mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.id AS customerId, gi.id AS stationId, c.grid_id AS gridId, gi.grid_name AS gridName, c.customer_name AS customerName, c.phone, c.customer_category AS customerCategory, c.subdivision_type AS subdivisionType, c.business_address AS businessAddress, c.gender, c.customer_situation AS customerSituation, c.business_years AS businessYears, c.current_financing AS currentFinancing, c.credit_demand AS creditDemand, c.demand_month AS demandMonth, c.demand_period AS demandPeriod, c.business_progress AS businessProgress, c.customer_source AS customerSource, c.is_applied AS isApplied, c.apply_time AS applyTime, c.is_approved AS isApproved, c.approve_time AS approveTime, c.loan_product_name AS loanProductName, c.loan_amount AS loanAmount, c.credit_limit AS creditLimit, c.loan_balance AS loanBalance, c.overdue_status AS overdueStatus, c.is_formal_customer AS isFormalCustomer, c.creator AS creatorId, c.create_time AS createTime, c.updater AS updaterId, -- 从 grid_customer 的 location 字段提取经纬度（POINT 类型） -- 注意：POINT存储格式为 POINT(latitude, longitude) ST_X(c.location) AS latitude, ST_Y(c.location) AS longitude FROM grid_customer c LEFT JOIN grid_info gi ON c.grid_id = gi.id AND gi.deleted = 0 AND gi.grid_type = 'HUINONG' WHERE c.id = #{id} AND c.customer_type = 'HUINONG_LOAN' AND c.deleted = 0

SELECT c.id, c.id AS customerId, c.grid_id AS gridId, gi.grid_name AS gridName, c.customer_name AS customerName, c.phone, c.customer_category AS customerCategory, c.subdivision_type AS subdivisionType, c.business_years AS businessYears, c.current_financing AS currentFinancing, c.is_formal_customer AS isFormalCustomer, c.create_time AS createTime FROM grid_customer c LEFT JOIN grid_info gi ON c.grid_id = gi.id AND gi.deleted = 0 WHERE c.customer_type = 'HUINONG_LOAN' AND c.deleted = 0
AND c.customer_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{reqVO.customerName}, '%')

SELECT c.id, c.id AS customerId, c.customer_name AS customerName, c.phone, c.customer_category AS customerCategory, c.subdivision_type AS subdivisionType, c.business_address AS businessAddress, c.loan_amount AS loanAmount, c.overdue_status AS overdueStatus, -- 从 grid_customer 的 location 字段提取经纬度（POINT 类型） -- 注意：POINT存储格式为 POINT(latitude, longitude) ST_X(c.location) AS latitude, ST_Y(c.location) AS longitude FROM grid_customer c INNER JOIN grid_info gi ON c.grid_id = gi.id AND gi.deleted = 0 AND gi.grid_type = 'HUINONG' WHERE gi.id = #{stationId} AND c.customer_type = 'HUINONG_LOAN' AND c.deleted = 0 AND c.location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY c.create_time DESC
